hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
cd $WORKSPACE export VECTORCAST_DIR=/home/vectorindia/vcast_64u export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=/home/vectorindia/vector-license/vector-VECTORINDIA.lic export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH echo $VECTORCAST_DIR $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version cp -r /home/vectorindia/firefox/firefox/* $WORKSPACE/.
echo $PWD . ./make_config echo "---- Results for Version:$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version " >> ../../firefox_results
../../metricscmd
time vcshell --metrics make -j4
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics >> ../../firefox_results
$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb clearmetrics
../../utilmetricscmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics >> ../../firefox_results
../../utilqikcmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
../../utilinstcmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
../../utilincrinstcmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
